definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: let loose (NH id., dissolve; As. šarû, Pi. open (building, for use), dedicate it; tašrîtu, dedication; Oaram. [[שרה]] loose, so Aram. [[שְׁרָא]], 4ro0; Eth. saraya: remit, condone);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. sf. [[יִשְׁרֵ֫הוּ]] Job 37:3 he (God) lets it loose (i.e. the thunder).

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. 1 s. sf. [[שֵׁרִיתִ֫ךָ]] Je 15:11 Qr I will set thee free (cf. Je 40:4 Targum SyrVer), but dub.; Kt [[שרותך]] (i.e. [[שָׁרוֹתִךָ]], √ [[שׁרר]]), Thes Gie I vex thee [[[שָׁרַר]] = [[חָרַר]], very dub.]; Ew al. RV strengthen thee; this yields best sense, but as Aram. [[שׁרר]] is intrans., read then [[שֵׁרַרְתִּךָ]] or [[הֲשֵׁרוֹתִךָ]], Dr; Jerome Rabb rd. [[שֵׁרִיתְךָ]] = [[שְׁאֵרִיתְךָ]] thy remnant (AV).
